annotations.description: Vanilla Punch was first published in the first edition of Jerry Thomas' Bar-Tenders manual also known as The Bon Vivant's Guide or How to Mix Drinks in 1862....
annotations.title: Master The Classics: Vanilla Punch

textContent:
1.5oz (45ml) Cognac
.75oz (22.5ml) Licor 43
.75oz (22.5ml) Lemon Juice
Orange Wedge
Luxardo Cherry

Whip shake and pour into glass. 
Top with crushed ice. 
Garnish with Orange Wedge and cherry. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NeGJqmmrCWs
title: Vanilla Punch
